actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to allow eligible veterans to receive certain educational assistance during the six-year period following their last discharge or release from active duty even if such period extends beyond December 31, 1989.

summary.text: Amends the delimiting period for veterans' educational assistance to permit eligible veterans to receive such assistance during the six-year period after their last discharge, even if such period extends beyond the December 31, 1989, termination date.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to allow eligible veterans to receive certain educational assistance during the six-year period following their last discharge or release from active duty even if such period extends beyond December 31, 1989.
